data.title: DWR Offers Grants for Urban and Multibenefit Drought Relief
data.excerpt: The Department of Water Resources (DWR) today announced the release of the program guidelines and proposal solicitation package to distribute $200 million in funding available through the Urban and Multibenefit Drought Relief Grant Program.
data.author: Peggy Gartin
